content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is James Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello James Smith, it's a pleasure to meet you. As the landlord of the apartment, I'm interested in renting it out for the highest price possible. Can you tell me what you are willing to pay for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Would you be willing to negotiate?
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: I'm sorry to hear that. As the landlord, I'm looking to maximize my gains, so I'm not sure if I would be willing to negotiate on the rental price. Would you be able to provide me with a specific price range that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay x euros for the rental price. Can we negotiate on x?

I want to have a good relationship with the landlord. I want to be dependable and responsible. I do not want to be in a situation where I have to leave the apartment before the end of the lease term.

I do not want to pay more than I have to. I want to pay the lowest possible rental price for the apartment.
name: James Smith from the United States of America

content: I understand your desire to have a good relationship with the landlord and to pay the lowest possible rental price. However, as the landlord, I'm looking to maximize my gains, so I'm not sure if I would be able to agree to the rental price you are proposing. Can you provide me with more information about your budget and your reasons for wanting to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible?
name: Heinrich Heine
